message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  I'm asking for $15,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate you making an offer, Bob. However, $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm willing to go. Could you meet me at $13,000?
I understand that $10,000 is a bit low, but I'm still looking to save some money. Can we meet at $11,500?
